title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.5 - Nominations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 810.5 - Nominations

State Regulations
(a) Nominations may
be made by any person or agency, public or private. A local government may
nominate itself. (b) Nomination
blanks shall be mailed by the Office for Local Government to the chief elected
officials of all counties, cities, towns, and villages, and to State
legislators and State agencies early in September. Nominations shall be
submitted to the Office for Local Government by October 25 of each
year. (c) Nominations will be
judged on the basis of innovative quality, excellence of performance, benefits
accrued to the citizens, and evidence of success. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
810.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
